title: Customized Mobile Microlearning Design for [Self-Directed] Adult Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and job-related language application experience
context.additional_context: Designing educational courses for advanced domain experts in managerial/leadership roles to improve language proficiency in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately read and compose basic workplace documents (emails, reports, etc.)
Learners independently complete five or more microlearning modules (5-minute duration) per week using mobile devices
Learners achieve an 80% or higher correct answer rate on the comprehensive assessment at the end of the one-week course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
